participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and adventurous, enjoys exploring new ideas and experiences.
participant_1.background: my father was a door to door salesman. i've three dogs. i am in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and dedicated, loves helping others and is very community-oriented.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
